flowtrend 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Package index

All functions

Estep()
E step, which updates the "responsibilities", which are posterior membership probabilities of each particle.
Mstep_mu()
Computes the M step for mu.
Mstep_mu_cvxr()
Used as a fallback or to test against Mstep_mu().
Mstep_prob()
The M step for the cluster probabilities
Mstep_sigma()
M step for cluster covariance (sigma).
W_update_fused()
Solve a fused lasso problem for the W update. Internally, a fused lasso dynamic programming solver prox() (which calls prox_dp() written in C) is used.
admm_oneclust()
One cluster's ADMM for a fixed step size (rho).
aug_lagr()
computes the Augmented lagrangian.
calc_max_lambda()
Estimate maximum lambda values numerically. First starts with a large initial value max_lambda_mean and max_lambda_prob, and runs the EM algorithm on decreasing set of values (sequentially halved). This stops once you see non-simple probabilities or means, and returns the smallest regularization (lambda) value pair that gives full sparsity.
create_destin()
Creates a directory destin, if it doesn't already exist.
create_oracle()
Reformatting |datobj| to create a flowtrend-like object that contains "oracle" information of the model that generates the simulated pseudo-real data.
cv_aggregate()
Aggregate CV scores from the results, saved in destin.
cv_aggregate_res()
Helper to aggregate CV results and obtain the |res| object, all saved in |destin|.
cv_flowtrend()
Cross-validation for flowtrend(). Saves results to separate files in destin.
cv_makebest()
From the results saved in destin, aggregate all |nrestart| files to retain only the "best" restart, and delete the rest.
cv_summary()
Main function for summarizing the cross-validation results.
dt2ylist()
Converting to a list of matrices, ylist, to input to flowtrend().
etilde_mat()
a
flowtrend()
Main function. Repeats the EM algorithm (flowtrend_once()) with |nrep| restarts (5 by default).
flowtrend_once()
Estimate flowtrend model once.
form_symmetric_kl_distmat()
From two probability matrices, form a (K x K) distance matrix of the (n)-vectors. The distance between the vectors is the symmetric KL divergence.
gen_diff_mat()
Generating Difference Matrix of Specified Order
gen_tf_mat()
A lasso regressor matrix H that can be used to solve an equivalent problem as the trend filtering of the k'th degree.
gen_tf_mat_equalspace()
Creates trend filtering regression matrix using Lemma 2 of Ryan Tibshirani's trendfilter paper (2014); works on equally spaced data only.
gendat_1d()
Generates some synthetic 1-dimensional data with three clusters. Returns a data frame with (1) time, (2) Y (3) mu (4) cluster assignments.
gendat_2d()
Generates some synthetic 2-dimensional data with three clusters.
gendat_3d()
Generates some synthetic 3-dimensional data with three clusters.
get_AB_mats()
a
get_C_mat()
a
get_best_match_from_kl()
Compute KL divergence from responsibilities between two models' responsibilities resp_new and resp_old.
get_max_lambda()
A wrapper for calc_max_lambda. Saves the two maximum lambda values in a file.
get_rand_from_table()
Calculate RAND index from a contingency table.
gmm_each()
Apply a gmm in each 1-dimensional cytogram.
init_mn()
Initialize the cluster centers.
init_sigma()
Initialize the covariances.
interpolate_mn()
Do a linear interpolation of the cluster means.
interpolate_prob()
Do a linear interpolation of the cluster means.
keep_only_best()
Keeping only the output files for the "best" restart, and deleting the rest.
keep_only_best_refit()
Keeping only the output files (among refit models) for the "best" restart, and deleting the rest.
la_admm_oneclust()
Locally adaptive ADMM; wrapper to admm_oneclust().
load_all_objectives()
Loading all objectives, with NA's for missing files
load_all_refit_objectives()
Loading all objectives, with NA's for missing files
loglik_tt()
Log likelihood for a single time point's data.
logspace()
Helper function to logarithmically space out R. length values linear on the log scale from max down to min.
make_best_cvscore_filename()
Create file name (a string) for cross-validation results.
make_best_refit_filename()
Create file name (a string) for re-estimated models for the lambda values indexed by iprob and imu.
make_contingency_table()
2 x 2 contigency table from membership vectors.
make_cv_folds()
Define the time folds cross-validation.
make_cv_folds_in_blocks()
Define the "blocked" time folds for cross-validation. This means that contiguous of times will be used to define CV folds.
make_cvscore_filename()
Create file name (a string) for cross-validation results.
make_iilist()
Helper to divide up the jobs in iimat into a total of arraynum_max jobs. The purpose is to divide the jobs, in order to run this on a server.
make_iimat()
Indices for the cross validation jobs.
make_iimat_small()
2d indices for the cross validation jobs.
make_refit_filename()
Create file name (a string) for re-estimated models for the lambda values indexed by iprob and imu.
match_clusters_gmm()
Sequentially permute a time series of GMMs.
matrix_function_solve_triangular_sylvester_barebonesC2()
Solve "barebones" sylvester equation that takes upper triangular matrices as coefficients.
memlist_to_respmat()
Convert list of memberships into a list of responsibilities.
my_mfrow()
Combine list of ggplots
objective()
Evaluating the penalized negative log-likelihood on all data ylist given parameters mu, prob, and sigma.
objective_per_cluster()
computes the ADMM objective for one cluster
one_job()
Helper function to run ONE job for CV, in iprob, imu, ifold, irestart.
one_job_refit()
Refit model for one pair of regularization parameter values. Saves to nrestart files named like "1-4-3-fit.Rdata", for "(iprob)-(imu)-(irestart)-fit.Rdata".
one_symmetric_kl()
Symmetric KL divergence between two Gaussian distributions.
overfit_gmm()
Pool the entire series of cytograms, fit a GMM model, and re-aggregate parameters.
parse_args()
Parse command line arguments and assigns the values of them. |args| is meant to just be additional command line arguments.
plot_1d()
Makes 1d plot of data and model
plot_1d_add_model()
Add a model to an existing plot from plot_1d(). This actually can take a model obj, and just plot the 1-dimensional projections of the model in the idim dimension.
plot_1d_with_membership()
Makes 1d plot of data when
plot_2d()
Simple plotter for 2d particle data.
plot_3d()
Makes three 2-dimensional plots of the 3d data
plot_prob()
Makes cluster probability plot (lines over time).
predict_flowtrend()
Prediction: Given new timepoints in the original time interval,generate a set of means and probs (and return the same Sigma).
print_progress()
A helper function to print the progress of a loop or simulation.
projCmat()
Project rows of matrix mat into a ball of size C.
rand()
Rand index between responsibilities.
rand_from_mems()
Faster rand index calculation from membership vectors.
rand_old()
A "soft" version of a rand index between two sets of responsibility (membership probability) matrices. Measures the /disagreement/ between the two clusterings.
reorder_clust()
Reorder the results of one object so that cluster 1 through numclust is in a particular order. The default is decreasing order of the averages (over time) of the cluster means.
reorder_gmm_fit()
Reordering function for gmm results.
reorder_kl()
Reorder the cluster numbers for a new flowtrend object newres; the best permutation (reordering) is to match the original flowtrend object origres. Also works for flowmix objects.
soft_gate_one_responsibility_matrix()
Soft-gates a responsibility matrix by a bernoulli (or multinoulli) draw.
softmax()
Softmax function.
symmetric_kl()
Symmetric KL divergence, of two probability vectors.
symmetric_kl_between_gaussians()
Between two sets of Gaussian mean/sd parameters, what is the symmetric KL distance.
underfit_gmm()
Pool the entire series of cytograms, fit a GMM model, and re-aggregate parameters.

Developed by Sangwon Hyun, Tim Coleman, Francois Ribalet, Jacob Bien.
